title: Apples iCloud Keychain
extract: If you're using two-step verification, or email, password, or security questionsChoose Settings > [your name] > iCloud. For 10.2 or earlier, tap Settings > iCloud.Tap Keychain and slide to turn it on.Enter your Apple ID, and follow the instructions.Sep 17, 2018
extract_html:
If you're using two-step verification, or email, password, or security questions
  1. Choose Settings > [your name] > iCloud. For 10.2 or earlier, tap Settings > iCloud.
  2. Tap Keychain and slide to turn it on.
  3. Enter your Apple ID, and follow the instructions.
Sep 17, 2018
